title: Praise God, from whom all blessings flow
The Lord is in His holy temple
melody: [The Lord is in His holy temple]

title: Glory be to the Father and to the Son and to the Holy Ghost
Glory be to the Father and to the Son and to the Holy Ghost
O worship the King, all-glorious above
Love divine, all loves excelling
Sing praise to God who reigns above
Praise ye the Father for His lovingkindness
Begin, my tongue, some heav'nly theme
Come, Thou Almighty King
Praise our God, all ye His servants
All people that on earth do dwell
Awake, my soul, to joyful lays
O God, our help in ages past
When all Thy mercies, O my God
Great God of wonders! all Thy ways
melody: [Great God of wonders! all Thy ways]

title: Praise ye the Lord, the Almighty, the King of creation!
God of everlasting glory
Brethren, we have met to worship
The Lord Is King! Lift up, lift up thy voice
Come, Thou Fount of ev'ry blessing
Now thank we all our God
The God of Abraham praise
We praise Thee, O God, our Redeemer, Creator
We gather together to ask the Lord's blessing
Ancient of Days, who sittest throned in glory
Come, we that love the Lord
We magnify our Father God
How I praise the great Creator
Rejoice, ye pure in heart
I sing the mighty pow'r of God
Holy God, we praise Thy name
Praise the Lord! ye heav'ns, adore Him
Bless the Lord and sing His praises
melody: [Bless the Lord and sing His praises]

title: All creatures of our God and King
All praise to Him who reigns above
melody: [All praise to Him who reigns above]

title: Stand up and bless the Lord
Immortal, invisible, God only wise
Praise, my soul, the King of heaven
A mighty fortress is our God
O Lord my God, when I in awesome wonder
Joyful, joyful, we adore Thee
This is my Father's world
Great is Thy faithfulness, O God my Father!
melody: [Great is Thy faithfulness, O God my Father!]

title: Oh, He's a wonderful Savior
All hail the pow'r of Jesus' name!
All hail the pow'r of Jesus' name!
And can it be that I should gain
Ye servants of God, your Master proclaim
O for a thousand tongues to sing
All glory to Jesus, begotten of God
O could I speak the matchless worth
Jesus! what a Friend for sinners!
Fairest Lord Jesus!
Praise the Savior, ye who know Him!
melody: [Praise the Savior, ye who know Him!]

title: Majestic sweetness sits enthroned
How sweet the name of Jesus sounds
For the beauty of the earth
Come, Christians, join to sing
Loved with everlasting love
Jesus, I am resting, resting
Jesus, the very thought of Thee
The great Physician now is near
Shepherd of eager youth
O the deep, deep love of Jesus
Crown Him with many crowns
Take the name of Jesus with you
melody: [Take the name of Jesus with you]

title: The name of Jesus is so sweet
melody: [The name of Jesus is so sweet]

title: Jesus! Jesus! Jesus!
Jesus, Thou Joy of loving hearts
O Savior, as my eyes behold
O day of rest and gladness
Safely through another week
Holy, Holy, Holy, Lord God Almighty!
Blessed day of rest and cheer!
Still, still with Thee—when purple morning breaketh
When morning gilds the skies
Now the day is over
Abide with me—fast falls the eventide
Savior, breathe an evening blessing
Sun of my soul, Thou Savior dear
Day is dying in the west
Softly now the light of day
Lord, dismiss us with Thy blessing
Savior, again to Thy dear name we raise
God be with you till we meet again
melody: [God be with you till we meet again]

title: O come, O come, Emmanuel
Come, Thou long-expected Jesus
Silent night! holy night!
Away in a manger, no crib for a bed
melody: [Away in a manger, no crib for a bed]

title: Joy to the world! the Lord is come!
In a cave, a lowly stable
Angels we have heard on high
It came upon the midnight clear
The first noel the angel did say
melody: [The first noel the angel did say]

title: O little town of Bethlehem
Hark! the herald angels sing
What child is this, who, laid to rest
While shepherds watch'd their flocks by night
As with gladness men of old
There's a song in the air!
I heard the bells on Christmas day
Angels, from the realms of glory
O come, all ye faithful, joyful and triumphant
Thou didst leave Thy throne
Born among cattle, in poverty sore
One day when heaven was filled with His praises
melody: [One day when heaven was filled with His praises]

title: Immortal Love—forever full
I know of a Name
Tell me the story of Jesus
Hosanna, loud hosanna
All glory, laud and honor
Ride on! ride on in majesty!
Alas! and did my Savior bleed?
Jesus is standing in Pilate's hall
Up Calv'ry's mountain, one dreadful morn
On a hill far away stood an old rugged cross
melody: [On a hill far away stood an old rugged cross]

title: There is a green hill far away
melody: [There is a green hill far away] (Stebbins)

title: My Lord has garments so wondrous fine
melody: [My Lord has garments so wondrous fine]

title: O sacred Head, now wounded
He was wounded for our transgressions
When I survey the wondrous cross
'Tis midnight–and on Olive's brow
There is a Fountain opened for my cleansing
melody: [There is a Fountain opened for my cleansing]

title: I look at the cross upon Calvary
melody: [I look at the cross upon Calvary]

title: Why did they nail Him to Calvary's tree?
melody: [Why did they nail Him to Calvary's tree]

title: In the cross of Christ I glory
King of my life I crown Thee now
melody: [King of my life I crown Thee now]

title: I hear the Savior say
Rock of ages, cleft for me
"Man of Sorrows!" what a name
Wounded for me, wounded for me
Alas! and did my Savior bleed?
God incarnate, Jesus came
Lift up, lift up your voices now!
I serve a living Savior, He's in the world today
melody: [I serve a living Savior, He's in the world today]

title: Alleluia! Alleluia! Alleluia! The strife is o'er–the battle done
I know that my Redeemer liveth
The day of resurrection!
Christ Is Risen from the Dead
Christ the Lord is ris'n today
Low in the grave He lay
Golden harps are sounding
Open wide, ye everlasting doors
Look, ye saints! the sight is glorious
Jesus shall reign where'er the sun
Rejoice – the Lord Is King!
Hark! ten thousands harps and voices
Hail, Thou once-despised Jesus!
Sooner or later the skies will be bright
melody: [Sooner or later the skies will be bright]

title: There'll be no dark valley when Jesus comes
melody: [There'll be no dark valley when Jesus comes]

title: When Jesus comes to reward His servants
melody: [When Jesus comes to reward His servants]

title: Ofttimes the day seems long, our trials hard to bear
melody: [Ofttimes the day seems long, our trials hard to bear]

title: When He cometh, when He cometh
Marvelous message we bring
Lo! He comes, with clouds descending
Jesus is coming to earth again
For God so loved the world
Lift up your heads, pilgrims aweary!
It may be at morn, when the day is awaking
melody: [It may be at morn, when the day is awaking]

title: On that bright and golden morning when the Son of man shall come
melody: [On that bright and golden morning when the Son of man shall come]

title: Come, Holy Spirit, heav'nly Dove
Joys are flowing like a river
How I praise Thee, precious Savior
O spread the tidings 'round, wherever man is found
melody: [O spread the tidings 'round, wherever man is found]

title: Hover o'er me, Holy Spirit
Open my eyes, that I may see
melody: [Open my eyes, that I may see]

title: Breathe on me, Breath of God
Holy Ghost, with light divine
Search me, O God, and know my heart today
Holy Spirit, now outpoured
Lord, I hear of show'rs of blessing
melody: [Lord, I hear of showers of blessing]

title: Holy Spirit, faithful guide
O Breath of Life, come sweeping thru us
Spirit of God, descend upon my heart
O Word of God incarnate
Thy Word is like a garden, Lord
Mid the storms of doubt and unbelief we fear
melody: [Mid the storms of doubt and unbelief we fear]

title: Standing on the promises of Christ my King
melody: [Standing on the promises of Christ my King]

title: Break Thou the bread of life
Thy Word is a lamp to my feet
melody: [Thy Word is a lamp to my feet]

title: The Bible stands like a rock undaunted
melody: [The Bible stands like a rock undaunted]

title: Holy Bible, Book divine
Lord God, our thanks to Thee we raise
Onward, Christian soldiers
O where are kings and empires now
Faith of our fathers, living still
Do you hear them coming, brother?
Glorious things of thee are spoken
The Church's one foundation
Blest be the tie that binds
I love Thy kingdom, Lord!
In Jordan's stream the Savior stood
We bless the name of Christ, the Lord
Here, O my Lord, I see Thee face to face
According to Thy gracious word
No, not desparingly
A ruler once came to Jesus by night
melody: [A ruler once came to Jesus by night]

title: I've a message from the Lord, hallelujah!
melody: [I've a message from the Lord, hallelujah!]

title: Blessed be the Fountain of blood
'Tis the promise of God, full salvation to give
melody: ['Tis the promise of God, full salvation to give]

title: Would you be free from the burden of sin?
melody: [Would you be free from the burden of sin?]

title: Sinners Jesus will receive!
What a wondrous message in God's Word!
melody: [What a wondrous message in God's Word!]

title: 'Tis the grandest theme thru the ages rung
melody: ['Tis the grandest theme thru the ages rung]

title: In times like these you need a Savior
melody: [In times like these you need a Savior]

title: "Whosoever heareth"– shout, shout the sound!
O soul, are you weary and troubled?
melody: [O soul, are you weary and troubled?]

title: Free from the law—O happy condition!
Wonderful grace of Jesus
O happy day that fixed my choice
melody: [O happy day that fixed my choice]

title: Have you been to Jesus for the cleansing pow'r?
melody: [Have you been to Jesus for the cleansing pow'r?]

title: Marvelous grace of our loving Lord
Saved by the blood of the Crucified One!
melody: [Saved by the blood of the Crucified One]

title: The cross, it standeth fast
What can wash away my sin?
The whole world was lost in the darkness of sin
melody: [The whole world was lost in the darkness of sin]

title: O what a Savior that He died for me!
melody: [Oh what a Savior that He died for me!]

title: Nor silver nor gold hath obtained my redemption
melody: [Nor silver nor gold hath obtained my redemption]

title: If you from sin are longing to be free
melody: [If you from sin are longing to be free]

title: Jesus, Thy blood and righteousness
Days are filled with sorrow and care
melody: [Days are filled with sorrow and care]

title: Grace! 'tis a charming sound
Fierce and wild the storm is raging
melody: [Fierce and wild the storm is raging]

title: Some thank the Lord for friends and home
melody: [Some thank the Lord for friends and home]

title: There Is a Fountain
Arise, my soul, arise!
I know not why God's wondrous grace
melody: [I know not why God's wondrous grace]

title: I heard the voice of Jesus say
I am not skilled to understand
O now I see the cleansing wave
melody: [O now I see the cleansing wave]

title: My faith has found a resting place
Tell me the old, old story
I've found a Friend who is all to me
melody: [I've found a Friend who is all to me]

title: We have heard the joyful sound
Christ our Redeemer died on the cross
melody: [Christ our Redeemer died on the cross]

title: Depth of mercy! can there be
Sing them over again to me
Pass me not, O gentle Savior
Amazing grace–how sweet the sound
Why do you wait, dear brother
O Jesus, Thou art standing
Art thou weary, art thou languid
I hear Thy welcome voice
Have you any room for Jesus
Out of my bondage, sorrow and night
melody: [Out of my bondage, sorrow and night]

title: The cross upon which Jesus died
If you are tired of the load of your sin
melody: [If you are tired of the load of your sin]

title: I have a Savior—He's pleading in glory
melody: [I have a Savior—He's pleading in glory]

title: Softly and tenderly Jesus is calling
Jesus is tenderly calling thee home
While we pray and while we plead
melody: [While we pray and while we plead]

title: Just as I am, without one plea
Some day you'll hear God's final call to you
melody: [Some day you'll hear God's final call to you]

title: "Almost persuaded" now to believe
Come, ev'ry soul by sin oppressed
I've wandered far away from God
Come to the Savior, make no delay
melody: [Come to the Savior, make no delay]

title: Blessed assurance, Jesus is mine!
When peace, like a river, attendeth my way
melody: [When peace, like a river, attendeth my way]

title: 'Tis so sweet to trust in Jesus
melody: ['Tis so sweet to trust in Jesus]

title: A wonderful Savior is Jesus my Lord
melody: [A wonderful Savior is Jesus my Lord]

title: O sometimes the shadows are deep
Lord, I care not for riches, neither silver nor gold
melody: [Lord, I care not for riches, neither silver nor gold]

title: When we walk with the Lord
Simply trusting ev'ry day
The Lord's our Rock, in Him we hide
melody: [The Lord's our Rock, in Him we hide]

title: I come to the garden alone
Will your anchor hold in the storms of life
melody: [Will your anchor hold in the storms of life]

title: Fade, fade, each earthly joy
All things work out for good, we know
How firm a foundation, ye saints of the Lord
Under His wings I am safely abiding
melody: [Under His wings I am safely abiding]

title: My soul in sad exile was out on life's sea
melody: [My soul in sad exile was out on life's sea]

title: Tho the angry surges roll
My hope is built on nothing less
melody: [My hope is built on nothing less]

title: Walk in the light! so shalt thou know
Earthly friends may prove untrue
I belong to the King—I'm a child of His love
melody: [I belong to the King—I'm a child of His love]

title: In the hour of trial
O Thou, in whose presence my soul takes delight
I am trusting Thee, Lord Jesus
My Father is rich in houses and lands
melody: [My Father is rich in houses and lands]

title: Dying with Jesus by death reckoned mine
melody: [Dying with Jesus by death reckoned mine]

title: I've seen the lightning flashing
O safe to the Rock that is higher than I
melody: [O safe to the Rock that is higher than I]

title: O how sweet the glorious message
There comes to my heart one sweet strain
melody: [There comes to my heart one sweet strain]

title: Peace, perfect peace—in this dark world of sin?
Come, ye disconsolate, where'er ye languish
Like a river glorious
Far away in the depths of my spirit tonight
melody: [Far away in the depths of my spirit tonight]

title: Does Jesus care when my heart is pained
melody: [Does Jesus care when my heart is pained]

title: Be still, my soul—the Lord is on thy side!
Guide me, O Thou great Jehovah
A pilgrim was I, and a-wand'ring
The Lord's my Shepherd—I'll not want
Savior, like a shepherd lead us
He leadeth me! O blessed thought!
All the way my Savior leads me
Be not dismayed whate'er betide
In shady, green pastures, so rich and so sweet
melody: [In shady, green pastures, so rich and so sweet]

title: Day by day and with each passing moment
melody: [Day by day and with each passing moment]

title: More secure is no one ever
The King of love my Shepherd Is
Savior, lead me, lest I stray
Jesus, Savior, pilot me
Savior, more than life to me
The future veiled before us lies
Give me a passion for souls, dear Lord
melody: [Give me a passion for souls, dear Lord]

title: I with Thee would begin
I'm pressing on the upward way
Beneath the cross of Jesus
Lord Jesus, I long to be perfectly whole
melody: [Lord Jesus, I long to be perfectly whole]

title: We would see Jesus, for the shadows lengthen
O perfect Love, all human thought transcending
Trying to walk in the steps of the Savior
melody: [Trying to walk in the steps of the Savior]

title: I am Thine, O Lord—I have heard Thy voice
melody: [I am Thine, O Lord—I have heard Thy voice]

title: Into the heart of Jesus
O to be like Thee! blessed Redeemer
melody: [O to be like Thee! blessed Redeemer]

title: A charge to keep I have
I need Thee ev'ry hour
I would be true, for there are those who trust me
O I want to be like Jesus
melody: [O I want to be like Jesus]

title: Nothing between my soul and the Savior
melody: [Nothing between my soul and the Savior]

title: Near to Thy heart, O Christ divine
More love to Thee, O Christ
God, the all-wise, and Creator
More like the Master I would ever be
melody: [More like the Master I would ever be]

title: More about Jesus would I know
O for a faith that will not shrink
Thou my everlasting portion
Sitting at the feet of Jesus
Fill all my vision, Savior, I pray
melody: [Fill all my vision, Savior, I pray]

title: Is your life a channel of blessing?
melody: [Is your life a channel of blessing?]

title: My Jesus, I love Thee, I know Thou art mine
May the mind of Christ, my Savior
Be Thou my Vision, O Lord of my heart
God of our youth, to whom we yield
O for a closer walk with God
Teach me Thy Way, O Lord
O grant Thy touch of fire, Lord
O Love that wilt not let me go
Nearer, still nearer—close to Thy heart
Savior, Thy dying love
Must Jesus bear the cross alone
I want a principle within
I must tell Jesus all of my trials
melody: [I must tell Jesus all of my trials]

title: 'Tis the blessed hour of prayer
Teach me to pray, Lord, teach me to pray
melody: [Teach me to pray, Lord, teach me to pray]

title: Are you weary, are you heavy hearted?
melody: [Are you weary, are you heavy hearted]

title: There's a garden where Jesus is waiting
melody: [There's a garden where Jesus is waiting]

title: "There shall be showers of blessing"
Teach me to trust when there is cause to fear
Jesus, keep me near the cross
Jesus, lover of my soul
If the world from you withhold of its silver and its gold
melody: [If the world from you withhold of its silver and its gold]

title: What a Friend we have in Jesus
From ev'ry stormy wind that blows
There is a place of quiet rest
melody: [There is a place of quiet rest]

title: Nearer, my God, to Thee
Dear Lord and Father of mankind
My faith looks up to Thee
Speak, Lord, in the stillness
Sweet hour of prayer, sweet hour of prayer
More holiness give me
Standing by a purpose true
Yield not to temptation
"Are ye able," said the Master
"Give me thy heart," says the Father above
melody: ["Give me thy heart," says the Father above]

title: Would you live for Jesus and be always pure and good?
melody: [Would you live for Jesus and be always pure and good?]

title: I wonder, have I done my best for Jesus
melody: [I wonder, have I done my best for Jesus]

title: Give of your best to the Master
melody: [Give of your best to the Master]

title: When upon life's billows you are tempest-tossed
melody: [When upon life's billows you are tempest-tossed]

title: Brightly beams our Father's mercy
Who is on the Lord's side?
You may have the joy-bells ringing in your heart
melody: [You may have the joy-bells ringing in your heart]

title: Jesus calls us o'ver the tumult
I gave My life for thee
Take time to be holy
Stand up, stand up for Jesus
Stand up, stand up for Jesus
Fight the good fight with all thy might!
Rise up, O men of God!
You have longed for sweet peace and for faith to increase
melody: [You have longed for sweet peace and for faith to increase]

title: Bring ye all the tithes into the storehouse
melody: [Bring ye all the tithes into the storehouse]

title: Jesus calls me—I must follow
I can hear my Savior calling
Take the world, but give me Jesus
melody: [Take the world, but give me Jesus]

title: All for Jesus, all for Jesus!
True-hearted, whole-hearted, faithful and loyal
Have Thine own way, Lord!
I am resolved no longer to linger
melody: [I am resolved no longer to linger]

title: Jesus, I my cross have taken
I sought a flag to follow
O Jesus, I have promised to serve Thee to the end
Take my life and let it be
All to Jesus I surrender
Only one life to offer
My life, my love I give to Thee
melody: [My life, my love I give to Thee]

title: I have decided to follow Jesus
Down in the valley with my Savior I would go
melody: [Down in the valley with my Savior I will go]

title: My new life I owe to Thee
Jesus, and shall it ever be
Sweet are the promises, Kind is the word
melody: [Sweet are the promises, Kind is the word]

title: Encamped along the hills of light
Soldiers of Christ, arise
The fight is on—the trumpet sound is ringing out
melody: [The fight is on—the trumpet sound is ringing out]

title: My soul, be on thy guard
A soldier in the army of the King of kings am I
melody: [A soldier in the army of the King of kings am I]

title: Lead on, O King Eternal
From over hill and plain
Ho, my comrades, see the signal
There's a royal banner given for display
melody: [There's a royal banner given for display]

title: Conquering now and still to conquer
The Son of God goes forth to war
Sound the battle cry! see—the foe is nigh!
melody: [Sound the battle cry! see—the foe is nigh!]

title: Am I a soldier of the cross?
Ye Christian heralds, go proclaim
So send I you to labor unrewarded
melody: [So send I you to labor unrewarded]

title: In Christ there is no East or West
Must I go, and empty-handed
Far and near the fields are teeming
melody: [Far and near the fields are teeming]

title: Sowing in the morning, sowing seeds of kindness
melody: [Sowing in the morning, sowing seeds of kindness]

title: Out in the darkness of sin they are waiting
melody: [Out in the darkness of sin they are waiting]

title: Anywhere with Jesus I can safely go
melody: [Anywhere with Jesus I can safely go]

title: We've a story to tell to the nations
melody: [We've a story to tell to the nations]

title: There's a call comes ringing o'er the restless wave
melody: [There's a call comes ringing o'er the restless wave]

title: Seeking the lost—yes, kindly entreating
Throw out the Life-Line across the dark wave!
melody: [Throw out the Life-Line across the dark wave!]

title: Far, far away, in heathen darkness dwelling
melody: Far, far away, in heathen darkness dwelling

title: To the work! to the work! we are servants of God
melody: [To the work! to the work! we are servants of God]

title: Ready to suffer grief or pain
O Zion, haste, thy mission high fulfilling
I love to tell the story
Rescue the perishing, care for the dying
melody: [Rescue the perishing, care for the dying]

title: From Greenland's icy mountains
Hail to the brightness of Zion's glad morning!
Lord, speak to me, that I may speak
Hark! 'tis the Shepherd's voice I hear
O Master, let me walk with Thee
Sweetly, Lord, have we heard Thee calling
melody: [Sweetly, Lord, have we heard Thee calling]

title: Work, for the night is coming
It may not be on the mountain's height
melody: [It may not be on the mountain's height]

title: I was sinking deep in sin
Praise Him! praise Him! Jesus, our blessed Redeemer!
melody: [Praise Him! praise Him! Jesus, our blessed Redeemer!]

title: There is no name so sweet on earth
melody: [There is no name so sweet on earth]

title: There's a wideness in God's mercy
There's not a friend like the lowly Jesus
melody: [There's not a friend like the lowly Jesus]

title: All my life long I had panted
melody: [All my life long I had panted]

title: I have found a friend in Jesus
melody: [I have found a friend in Jesus]

title: There's a sweet and blessed story
To God be the glory—great things He hath done!
melody: [To God be the glory—great things He hath done!]

title: There will never be a sweeter story
melody: [There will never be a sweeter story]

title: There is never a day so dreary
melody: [There is never a day so dreary]

title: I stand amazed in the presence
There's within my heart a melody
Christ has for sin atonement made
I have a song that Jesus gave me
melody: [I have a song that Jesus gave me]

title: So precious is Jesus, my Savior, my King
melody: [So precious is Jesus, my Savior, my King]

title: There's a melody of gladness that is ringing in my heart
melody: [There's a melody of gladness that is ringing in my heart]

title: Ring the bells of heaven! there is joy today
melody: [Ring the bells of heaven! there is joy today]

title: In loving-kindness Jesus came
What a fellowship, what a joy divine
melody: [What a fellowship, what a joy divine]

title: I stand all amazed at the love Jesus offers me
melody: [I stand all amazed at the love Jesus offers me]

title: There is sunshine in my soul today
melody: [There is sunshine in my soul today]

title: Who can cheer the heart like Jesus
melody: [Who can cheer the heart like Jesus]

title: When I saw the cleansing fountain
I thirsted in the barren land of sin and shame
melody: [I thirsted in the barren land of sin and shame]

title: Once far from God and dead in sin
melody: [Once far from God and dead in sin]

title: I have a song I love to sing
melody: [I have a song I love to sing]

title: I will sing the wondrous story
I've found a Friend, O such a Friend!
melody: [I've found a Friend, O such a Friend!]

title: Jesus is all the world to me
melody: [Jesus is all the world to me]

title: Wonderful love that rescued me
Walking in sunlight all of my journey
melody: [Walking in sunlight all of my journey]

title: O what a wonderful, wonderful day
Naught have I gotten but what I received
melody: [Naught have I gotten but what I received]

title: Redeemed—how I love to proclaim it!
It is glory just to walk with Him whose blood has ransomed me
melody: [It is glory just to walk with Him whose blood has ransomed me]

title: Years I spent in vanity and pride
melody: [Years I spent in vanity and pride]

title: There's a peace in my heart that the world never gave
melody: [There's a peace in my heart that the world never gave]

title: Jesus loves me! this I know
In tenderness He sought me
I wandered in the shades of night
melody: [I wandered in the shades of night]

title: No more I'll wander in the dreadful night of sin and shame
melody: [No more I'll wander in the dreadful night of sin and shame]

title: There is a name I love to hear
melody: [There is a name I love to hear]

title: To Jesus ev'ry day I find my heart is closer drawn
melody: [To Jesus ev'ry day I find my heart is closer drawn]

title: We praise Thee, O God, for the Son of Thy love
melody: [We praise Thee, O God, for the Son of Thy love]

title: Of Jesus' love that sought me
Jesus my Lord will love me forever
melody: [Jesus my Lord will love me forever]

title: I will sing of my Redeemer
Down at the cross where my Savior died
melody: [Down at the cross where my Savior died]

title: Jesus comes with pow'r to gladden
Heavenly joy is ringing
I am so glad that our Father in heav'n
melody: [I am so glad that our Father in heav'n]

title: Since the Savior found me, pardoned all my sin
melody: [Since the Savior found me, pardoned all my sin]

title: A Friend I have, called Jesus
O the unsearchable riches of Christ!
I heard an old, old story, how a Savior came from glory
melody: [I heard an old, old story, how a Savior came from glory]

title: When I can read my title clear
Sing the wondrous love of Jesus
O the blessed contemplation
When the trumpet of the Lord shall sound and time shall be no more
melody: [When the trumpet of the Lord shall sound and time shall be no more]

title: After the toil and the heat of the day
melody: [After the toil and the heat of the day]

title: When my life-work is ended and I cross the swelling tide
melody: [When my life-work is ended and I cross the swelling tide]

title: Walking along life's road one day
There's a land that is fairer than day
melody: [There's a land that is fairer than day]

title: When all my labors and trials are o'er
melody: [When all my labors and trials are o'er]

title: On the happy, golden shore
Tho like pilgrims here we wander
For all the saints who from their labors rest
The sands of time are sinking
Shall we gather at the river
Face to face with Christ, my Savior
melody: [Face to face with Christ, my Savior]

title: Some day the silver cord will break
melody: [Some day the silver cord will break]

title: Love divine, so great and wondrous
Come, we that love the Lord
I've reached the land of corn and wine
melody: [I've reached the land of corn and wine]

title: My heav'nly home is bright and fair
On Jordan's stormy banks I stand
Over the sunset mountains
Great God, we sing that mighty hand
Another year is dawning !
Where cross the crowded ways of life
Our thanks, O God, for fathers
Happy the home when God is there
Gracious Savior, who didst honor
O give us homes built firm upon the Savior
Come, ye thankful people, come
Thanks, O God, for boundless mercy
O say, can you see, by the dawn's early light
melody: [O say, can you see, by the dawn's early light]

title: My country, 'tis of thee
Mine eyes have seen the glory of the coming of the Lord
melody: [Mine eyes have seen the glory of the coming of the Lord]

title: O beautiful for spacious skies
God of our fathers, whose almighty hand
We bid thee welcome in the name
Let all the world in ev'ry corner sing
melody: [Let all the world in ev'ry corner sing]

title: Hear our pray'r, O Lord
Almighty Father, hear our prayer
All things come of Thee, O Lord
melody: [All things come of Thee, O Lord]

title: We give Thee but Thine own
The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ
melody: [The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ]

title: The Lord bless you and keep you
melody: [The Lord bless you and keep you]

title: Amen, Amen
Amen, Amen, Amen
Amen, Amen, Amen, Amen
May the grace of Christ our Savior
